description:
'''Sigilkore''' is a [[microgenre]] of [[trap music]] that incorporates elements of [[electronic music]] and [[cloud rap]], originating in the late 2010s in the United States on [[SoundCloud]]. It is characterized by  layered [[Remix|DJ mixing]] and digital effects such as [[bitcrushing]] and [[pitch shifting]], often layered in-post over recorded vocals.

Identifying factors of pop music usually includes digital stereo effects, often layered in-post over recorded vocals, alongside bass-boosted [[Roland TR-808|808s]], wide and [[Slowed and reverb|reverb-soaked]] synths, and [[Bitcrusher|bitcrush effects]].
